raw_body: AMARATUNGA - RANEE (nee SENEVIRATNE). Retired Teacher from St. Joseph’s Balika, Kegalle, and former Principal of Royal International School, Kegalle, wife of the late Jin Amaratunga, loving mother of Cheleka and Dmitri, mother-in-law of Avindra and Vibhu, sister of Ajantha and the late Monica, Benita, and Madura, and loving grandmother of Leyanvi, Kisali, Nikhil, and Mithyl, passed away.
